channel.title: New Server Development, Looking for developers
channel.description:
[u][b] Introduction. [/b][/u] So basically, i have been very bored lately, so i thought, why not make a RSPS? So i'm here now, Developing one. xD I have not Yet chosen a name for the server, i need some suggestions for that. :) This server is going to be based on economy and good skilling! Where you make your money from skilling, Such as herblore - Making your own super pots. I am using the base Of Project insanity, with none off that 543538958 loading 42094 shit.
[b][u]Unique.[/u][/b] I want this server, to be [b][i]Really[/i][/b] unique, but im going too need your guys help, With suggestions and what not. I will be changing the home, but i do not know where Yet.
[b][i][u]Money.[/u][/i][/b] I have money, to buy the vps, domains And advertisements So we will not need to worry about that.
[b][i][u]Goals.[/u][/i][/b]
[ul][li]Very Stable server.[/li] [li]Make the server unique.[/li] [list] [li]New home.[/li] [li]Decent Forums.[/li] [list] [li]Npc/player clipping[/li] [li]Cool interface's.[list] [li]Have a great Economy [/li] [li]A great player base.[/li] [/list][/li] [/list] [/list][/ul]
[u][b]Spots that are open.[/b][/u]
[ul][li][b]GFX:[/b][/li] [li][b]Server Coder:[/b][/li] [list] [li][b]Website Person:[/b][/li] [li][b]Client Coder:[/b][/li] [/list][/ul]
[b][u]Workers:[/u][/b] Pot up Pls (server) Asshole_Rule (server) kronixz: (website)
[b][i]Applications.[/i][/b] [code] Name: Position: Experience: Msn/Skype: Previous work: [/code]
[b]I haven't really done much yet.[/b]
Time for a few pictures.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2rnx7y0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/23vhzlw.png[/img]
Will post some more in abit.

What’s new…? You should add something before asking for a team

Still haven’t got a server name, does anyone know a decent server name?

Introduction.
So basically, i have been very bored lately, so i thought, why not make a RSPS? So i’m here now, Developing one. xD
I have not Yet chosen a name for the server, i need some suggestions for that. This server is going to be based on economy and good skilling!
